title: Basic IQ Test
description: A comprehensive 40-question IQ test that measures your cognitive abilities across multiple domains including logical reasoning, pattern recognition, and verbal comprehension.

title: Premium IQ Assessment
description: Our most comprehensive IQ assessment with 60 questions, detailed analysis, and personalized recommendations for cognitive improvement.

title: Professional Cognitive Evaluation
description: A professional-grade cognitive evaluation used by psychologists and educators. Includes detailed report and cognitive profile analysis.
